title: Cellphone fonts
content:
What font do cellphones generally use - or, at least, what font suits a cellphone? I'm looking for a typeface that relates to a txt messaging design I'm doing..

Thanks!
author: QueenSammy

comments.content:
iPhone - Helvetica  
WM - Nina, Tahoma, Segoe Condensed - substitute Myriad Condensed  
Nokia - Nokia Sans - substitute Rotis ;-)  
Motorola - the most horrible bitmap fonts you can find on dafonts :-(  
G1 / Android - Ascender Droid fonts
[FF Call](http://web.archive.org/web/20110818115159/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ff+call&x=0&y=0) was made to mimick the look of fonts from cellphones of the, erm, _older_ generation.
